Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: {VV##55 : GHC.Types.Module | $k_##56}{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: module GHC.Num_LHAssumptions where
 3: 
 4: {-@
 5: embed GHC.Num.Integer.Integer as int
 6: 
 7: assume GHC.Num.fromInteger :: (GHC.Num.Num a) => x:GHC.Num.Integer.Integer -> {v:a | v = x }
 8: 
 9: assume GHC.Num.negate :: (GHC.Num.Num a)
10:                => x:a
11:                -> {v:a | v = -x}
12: 
13: assume GHC.Num.abs :: (GHC.Num.Num a) => x:a -> {y:a | (x >= 0 ==> y = x) && (x < 0 ==> y = -x) }
14: 
15: assume GHC.Num.+ :: (GHC.Num.Num a) => x:a -> y:a -> {v:a | v = x + y }
16: assume GHC.Num.- :: (GHC.Num.Num a) => x:a -> y:a -> {v:a | v = x - y }
17: @-}
